example.text: This week the House unanimously passed a resolution condemning China's brazen violation of US sovereignty and airspace with its "spy balloon." The fact that the Chinese Communist Party was able to fly their spy balloon over numerous states and sensitive military sites is simply unacceptable.

I'm proud to be a member of the bipartisan SALT Caucus and on Wednesday we held a press conference at the Capitol reaffirming our commitment to a full repeal of the SALT cap. Rep. Lawler addresses SALT cap repeal efforts at bipartisan SALT Caucus press conference.

Putnam Hospital's new birthing center is welcome news for the Hudson Valley, providing modern healthcare and long-term support to new and expecting mothers throughout the Hudson Valley. Rep. Lawler's office presents an official certificate to Putnam Hospital.
Putin's ultimate vision is to restore the territory Russia lost after the collapse of the Soviet Union. He is a tyrant and a thug who must be held accountable for his war crimes.
Rep. Lawler holds press conference with local leaders on Gov. Hochul's housing and payroll tax proposals.

The American people deserve answers and both of the committees on which I serve - Financial Services and Foreign Affairs - are devoting their attention to getting to the bottom of this and confronting the threat posed by China to our economy, our sovereignty, and our interests across the globe. Rep. Lawler discusses the Chinese "spy balloon" fiasco with Neil Cavuto.

I'm proud to be a member of the bipartisan SALT Caucus and on Wednesday we held a press conference at the Capitol reaffirming our commitment to a full repeal of the SALT cap. Rep. Lawler addresses SALT cap repeal efforts at bipartisan SALT Caucus press conference.
